CustomField.description: You can define an overlay on top of your background image. Enter a 6 digit HEX code without the "#" character and use the "Overlay 1 Opacity" field to set the opacity of this solid color.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: You can define an overlay on top of your background image. Enter a 6 digit HEX code without the "#" character and use the "Overlay 1 Opacity" field to set the opacity of this solid color.
CustomField.label: Overlay 1 Color (#)
